name: Thing in Your Living Room
description:
Thing in Your Living Room is a mix of virtual pet and unfolding puzzle, where your objective is to raise a mysterious creature from egg to adulthood, with the outcome varying depending on your actions. Completing your critter catalogue will require attention and lateral thinking, as every specific adult outcome requires the thing in your living room to be interacted with in a specific manner. Can you complete your collection?

This game was developed as part of the Ready Player 42 game jam, in September 2020.
